document.masterDocTitle: A review and notes on the phylogenetic relationship of the centipede genus Otostigmus Porat, 1876 (Chilopoda: Scolopendromorpha: Scolopendridae) from Vietnam

caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 16.
Otostigmus multidens Haase, 1887
(IEBR-Chi 043).
Antenna and anterior part of body, dorsal view (A). Head and basal antennomeres, dorsal view (B). Ocelli, lateral view (C). Head, ventral view (D).

FIGURE 17.
Otostigmus multidens Haase, 1887
(IEBR-Chi 043).
Sternites 9-10 (A). Tergites 9-10 (B). Spiracle 9 th (C). Last segment and ultimate legs, dorsal view (D).

FIGURE 18.
Otostigmus multidens Haase, 1887
(IEBR-Chi 043).
Coxopleural processes, latera view (A). Prefemur of the ultimate leg, subventral view (B).

FIGURE 19. Distribution of
Otostigmus multidens Haase, 1887
in Vietnam

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . The species has also been reported from Indonesia and Papua New Guinea ( Lewis 2001 ; Schileyko 2007 ).

Remarks . The species seems to be distributed widely in Vietnam ( Fig. 19 ). We have not observed considerable variation among examined specimens. Thus, we considered two subspecies
O. multidens multidens
and
O. multidens nordicus
as only one species
O. multidens .
